text: Jill Valentine is a character of the Resident Evil franchise. She first appeared as a playable character in the first game released in 1996. ==Portrayals== In the 2002-2016 movie series, she was played by Sienna Guillory. In Marvel vs. Capcom 3, she was voiced by Kari Wahlgren. ==Reception== Jill is known for being sexy by video game standards. Barry's quote to her in the 1996 game "You were almost a Jill sandwich!" was noted for being cheesy. In the 2002 iteration of the first game, he says instead "A second late, you would have fit nicely into a sandwich." Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1996 Category:Marvel vs. Capcom fighters Category:Resident Evil characters Category:Video game protagonists
title: Jill Valentine
